data.product_title: BIODANCE Bio-Collagen Real Deep Mask, Hydrating Overnight Hydrogel Mask, Pore Minimizing, Elasticity, Plumping Improvement, Korean Skin Care, Valentines Day Gifts for Her | 1.19oz(34g) x 4ea
about_product: DEEP HYDRATION: The oligo-hyaluronic acid in the Biodance Bio-Collagen Real Deep Mask provides superior moisturizing effects compared to regular hyaluronic acid. It quickly hydrates the skin's surface and penetrates deeper layers, leaving the complexion healthy and well-moisturized.

PORE MINIMIZING & FIRMING: Ultra-low molecular collagen maximizes absorption and skin penetration. It helps refine enlarged pores, enhances skin elasticity immediately after application, and visibly reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

BRIGHTENS THE SKIN: Formulated with Galactomyces Ferment Filtrate and Niacinamide, it improves uneven skin tone and texture while offering antioxidant effects, resulting in healthier, more radiant skin.
ESSENCE SOLIDIFIED: Each 1.19 oz bottle of essence is solidified into each mask sheet.
BECOMES TRANSPARENT: The mask turns transparent after 3 hours or overnight using, delivering active ingredients deep into the skin. So it is suitable for morning shed.

SAFE FOR SENSITIVE SKIN: All Biodance products are formulated with non-toxic, non-irritant ingredients. They are free from common allergens and 19 other harmful or controversial substances, making them completely safe for sensitive skin.

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: #5 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care)    #1 in Facial Masks

top_reviews.review_title: Noticeable Results Across Skin Types, Effective, High-Quality Mask
top_reviews.review_comment: There are countless sheet masks on the market, and it can be difficult to distinguish one from another, but this is a truly high-quality, top-performing option. Both my mature skin and my daughter’s teenage skin showed visible improvement using these masks just once a week, addressing different needs while delivering consistent hydration and skin-smoothing results. The mask provides excellent moisture and leaves the skin feeling smooth, supple, glowing, and refreshed without irritation or stickiness. We use these both alongside other products from this line and in combination with other highly rated skincare brands, and they integrate well into a broader routine. What stands out most is the value. While not inexpensive, these masks rival far more expensive, luxury and prescription-grade skincare products we’ve used in the past—without the gimmicks. The quality and results justify the cost, must smell is wonderful, and this brand has become a regular part of our skincare routine.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2026

top_reviews.review_comment: My initial encounter with these was until TikTok but I ordered them from Amazon for myself and my daughter for convenience and Prime shipping. There were two choices I think the one is a four-pack and the one I got is a 16 pack. The 16 pack will last you 4 months if you're doing it once a week as instructed. I open the top and two sides when I'm doing it just to have accessibility and to be able to use the remnants liquid in the pack after I'm done applying the facial part I put the liquid in the pack on my neck and chest. They are a little slippery when you take them out. I watched a video on how to apply it and did the bottom part first and then the top part sometimes I have to snip the top part near the nose to get it to fit properly but you don't have to in general. There are three pieces that are left over the two eye pieces and the lip piece. You can put them below your eyes or above your eyes on your brows and then put the mask over them which is what I do. Or you can put them under your eyes and put the mask over them but I find it doesn't absorb all the way in that location due to the double thickness I guess. The lip one you can put over your lip or put it on vertically over your throat where the skin can get a little saggy. Once you have it on it's best to sit back and relax for 30 minutes or so at about a 45° angle so it doesn't slip off. After about 10 to 15 minutes it doesn't slip around as much and after 30 it's obviously started absorbing and tends to stay pretty well. I haven't noticed any staining on the pillows or anything like that from it and by morning actually by 4 hours later it's completely absorbed and all you have left on your faces the plastic that it was attached to. You just pull that off and throw it away. It's white when you put it on and it's clear when it absorbs. I definitely noticed an improvement in my skin quality and the collagen sinks in easily and less about a week. I am a redhead with delicate skin and I haven't had any reaction to this product at all I know that other masks have caused problems for friends but I've used this one for over a year now and I love it. My daughter and I both use it weekly and they're easy to take with you if you're traveling great way to pamper your skin after a day outside on the beach. The price is reasonable for what it is and what it does. I've gotten several compliments on my skin and I'm over 60 so that saying something for the results! All in all this is a very good product, it doesn't smell and doesn't seem to have any impurities like some others. My skin isn't irritated by it and looks great afterwards. If you're wondering if it washes off once it's soaked in you can wash your face all you want but you're just going to have beautiful glowing cheeks. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this or give it as a gift!
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: This mask is incredible! The bio-collagen formula deeply hydrates and tightens my skin. I wake up the next morning with incredibly plump, radiant, and smooth skin. It adheres perfectly to the face, making it comfortable to wear overnight. It's a luxury spa treatment at home!
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2026

top_reviews.review_comment: I will lead with this statement: this mask leaves my skin feeling and looking great. If the upper lip portion didn't ALWAYS slip it would have been five stars. The upper lip is too small/thin and it causes it to slide down onto your lips almost immediately. This wouldn't be so annoying if you didn't have to deal with it for hours😂 Now that that's out of the way... I love the way my face feels after. It leaves it moisturized and with a healthy glow. I also see a decrease in forehead lines although it's short term and usually back to normal within a day. The masks are not perfum-y. They do not bother my sensitive skin. They do have to be worn a very long time though, and I'm not sure how anyone is wearing this to bed and having it actually stay on. It also is delicate and tears easily on application. I tend to use the eye and mouth leftovers to mend those gaps. I've ordered these several times and will continue to use despite some of the downsides because the results seem worth it.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2026

top_reviews.review_comment: Easy to use. No smell. Took a few hours to dry. But my face felt so soft and hydrated. The glow was intense!
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2026

top_reviews.review_comment: Miracle Mask. See instant results next morning. Skin is firmer, smoother and minor wrinkles are gone. It last till the end of day. Note: must wear it whole night long until the mask turns from opaque white to clear
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2026

top_reviews.review_title: Worth the Wait: Deep Hydration That Delivers
top_reviews.review_comment: I’ll be honest this mask took a little time for me to really feel and see the results. It wasn’t an instant “wow” the first night, but after consistent use, I’m genuinely impressed. The hydrogel feels incredibly hydrating and soothing overnight, and I noticed my skin looked more plump and refreshed in the morning. Over time, my pores appeared more refined and my skin felt smoother and healthier overall. If you’re looking for something gentle but effective, this is worth the patience. I ended up loving it, and it’s now part of my skincare rotation. 💜
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2026

top_reviews.review_comment: I recently tried the BIODANCE Bio-Collagen Real Deep Mask and was impressed by the results. This overnight hydration mask has a unique jelly-like texture that adheres well to the skin without slipping off. The mask delivered noticeable hydration - my skin felt plumper and more moisturized the next morning. I appreciated that it didn’t leave any sticky residue and absorbed well throughout the night. The oligo-hyaluronic acid really seemed to work its magic on my dry patches. The mask is easy to use and mess-free, which is a plus for overnight treatments. After using it consistently, I noticed my skin looked more radiant and felt smoother to the touch.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2026

top_reviews_global.review_comment: favourite face mask, great for sensitive skin and really moisturises
